title: Simplify Development Task UI
description: Remove Branch field, PR status text, and Rebase link from Development Task interface to create a cleaner, more focused user experience that eliminates visual clutter.
iWant: a simplified Development Task interface with Branch, PR status, and Rebase elements removed
soThat: I can focus on core task details without distracting interface elements
acceptanceCriteria: Branch field is completely removed from Development Task view
PR created and ready for development text is hidden
Rebase link is eliminated from task actions
Interface maintains clean layout after element removal
